name: promptr (ferrislucas)
description: [项目级] Promptr is a CLI tool that applies plain language instructions to the filesystem. Instructions can utilize a liquidjs based templating system. Use cases include refactoring, code generation, and experimentation.。来源: https://github.com/ferrislucas/promptr

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Promptr is a CLI tool that applies plain language instructions to the filesystem. Instructions can utilize a liquidjs based templating system. Use cases include refactoring, code generation, and experimentation.

来源: https://github.com/ferrislucas/promptr
语言: JavaScript
Stars: 945

test

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
`promptr [options] -p "your instructions" ...`
I've found this to be a good workflow: - Commit any changes, so you have a clean working area. - Author your prompt in a file. The prompt should be specific clear instructions. - Make sure your prompt contains the relative paths of any files that are relevant to your instructions. - Use Promptr to execute your prompt. Provide the path to your prompt file using the `-p` option: `promptr -p my_prompt.txt` Promptr will apply the model's code directly to your files. Use your favorite git UI to inspect the results.
